spec_data.Name: perl-Lingua-EN-Sentence
spec_data.Description:
The Lingua::EN::Sentence module contains the function get_sentences, which
splits text into its constituent sentences, based on a regular expression
and a list of abbreviations (built in and given).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:48:40 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Module for splitting text into sentences
